text:
Oh woah your journey into vfx is so much more interesting than mine ahah, I just saw escape online and thought i'd apply for their undergrad course hahaha

I have heard of Harriet before, my friends know her and one of them is Tiago Faria's cousin Diogo, so I've heard a lot of positive things about Union!
I get what you mean when you said you got hooked on nuke, I was the same, as soon as I touched the program I haven't stopped loving it! Recently I learnt silhouette and have realised how fun roto can be! I'm not really a fan of roto-ing in nuke :smile:

In regards to guitar, I play electric and anything from metal to math rock, how about you?

Oh yes Tiago is a lead on the show Iâ€™m on atm, nice chap. 
Can you a paint me a picture in your own words, how you imagine VFX is right now, minus the pandemic :sweat_smile:, so that I can add or correct something in it.
I think there is a notion that if you worked at the big facilities like Dneg or MPC and others you are more likely to get your next gig much easier. - what do you think?

I like me some good metal, SOAD and Deftones maybe Trivium some times floating on top.

Guitar wise, electric too. I got into blues lately, so trying to learn as much as I can right now in this genre.
